sections.title: Internationalization Directory
sections.content: The `08-i18n` directory contains documents related to internationalization (i18n), localization (l10n), template systems, and language support. This directory focuses on making the system accessible to users from different regions and language backgrounds.

sections.title: Purpose
sections.content: This directory serves as a central location for internationalization-related information. The documents here define how the system supports multiple languages, cultural conventions, and region-specific requirements. This directory is important for understanding how to implement and maintain multilingual support in the system.

sections.title: Key Documents
sections.content:
- **template-system-json-i18n-design.json**: Design of the template system with i18n support
- **multilingual-support-plan.json**: Plan for implementing multilingual support

Additional documents include:
- Translation workflows
- Locale-specific configurations
- Cultural adaptation guidelines
